thread.title: Rosneft Chief Warns of Danger of Crude Output Decline
thread.title_full: Rosneft Chief Warns of Danger of Crude Output Decline - WSJ

author: Andrey Ostroukh
title: Rosneft Chief Warns of Danger of Crude Output Decline
text:
MOSCOW—Russia’s oil czar warned that the country’s crude production could drop by around 5% a year if the government pushes through plans to increase taxes on the industry to plug holes in the federal budget.
Igor Sechin, chief executive of state oil giant OAO Rosneft, said Tuesday that ministers’ plans not to reduce export duties would leave less money for investment in Russia’s critical oil and gas industry, which accounts for...
